topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559e0f6e6368725fc3000b39#post_559e0f6e6368725fc3000b39
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559e0e9e63687224a600021c#post_559e0e9e63687224a600021c
But corporations have the money. And they, indirectly control the government.[/bq]
True; but as a country develops their gdp increases as well as the amount of information they generate increases.

To use an analogy even china's great firewall is struggling to keep up with the information generated.  If you have exponential information generated eventually you're ability to control the information gets outpaced.

To use a math analogy it's the difference between the formula y=x^2 versus y=2x; eventually your ability to control people will be outpaced by the amount of information generated.


Yeah; I'm going to go bed in two minutes; I can't even stand now.
